title: Tempting the Law
description: Eden literally fell into Coen's arms as he rescued her, and she has belonged to him ever since that day. She has sent him an invitation to her graduation and he's obliged to go... Right?Coen has always been Eden's knight in shining armor, and now she needs him more than ever. Will he come and rescue her one final time?Warning: This book is short, with speed-of-light insta-love and a ridiculous storyline. If you're looking for quick and dirty, then come tempt the law with us!
author: Alexa Riley
